name: Managing Your Home
body:
### Concept
*Managing Your Home* is a web application that allows the user to remotely manage several devices with just a tap. Devices manageable include lights, blinds, entertainment systems, household appliances, etc.

### Demo
Try *Managing Your Home* [here](http://web.ist.utl.pt/~ist168202/ccu).

### Context
This project was developed in the context of User Centered Design, an MSc course at Instituto Superior TÃ©cnico.

### Authors
* @davidcalimero
* @vania-mendonca
* @RitaRaimundo
